a.h1: Fillmore Central Public Schools Excellence in Education

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Fillmore Central is providing School Lunches for Students at no charge. If you would like to sign up your child(ren) to receive lunches for the remainder of the time...
Please see the letter below from Mr. Norvell regarding graduation:

Date: April 15th, 2020To: Kindergarten Parents/Guardians for the 2020-21 School Year From: Aaron Veleba, Elementary Principal
Re: Parent/Guardian Meeting and Round...
Senior Spotlight: Macy Scott. Macy plans to attend Southeast Community College in Beatrice to play basketball and study elementary education and special education. Good luck at SCC! view image
Senior Spotlight: Macy Scott. Macy plans to attend Southeast Community College in Beatrice to play basketball and study elementary education and special education. Good luck at SCC! view image
Senior Spotlight: Carson Tatro. Carson plans to attend the University of Nebraska at Lincoln and major in PGA Golf Management. Good luck at UNL. view image
Senior Spotlight: Abigail Parten. Abbey plans to attend Nebraska Wesleyan University and major in elementary education and psychology. Good luck at NWU! view image
Senior Spotlight: Michaela Baker. Micheala plans to go to UNL to major in Psychology. Good luck at UNL! view image
